short_description: astha infra engg. i private limited is a metal storage tanks supplier based in navi mumbai, india.
long_description: ltd has been at the forefront of its industry since its establishment in ,2002. we have become a leader in our field with over 21 years of experience in providing top-quality tank jacking equipment and automatic girth welding (agw) machines. our unparalleled commitment to excellence has enabled us to serve various industries, including the oil and gas sector. we take pride in our innovative approach to designing, developing, & manufacturing welded and steel-bolted tanks and hydraulic jacks. astha infra engineering (india) pvt ltd is a proudly iso-certified company that specializes in providing high-quality tank jacking equipment for welded and steel-bolted tanks. we work with leading companies to provide the best construction solutions to our clients. our commitment is to provide reliable & efficient solutions to our client's needs.. aieipl is dedicated to cultivating and sustaining an atmosphere that encourages our diverse and dynamic workforce to generate value for our clients. we apply our extensive experience, profound industry knowledge, and expertise to assist our clients in realizing their requirements, with safety and efficiency as our top priorities globally.
generated_description: astha infra engg (i) pvt ltd, based in ambernath, maharashtra, is a company specializing in the manufacturing, erection, and refurbishment of storage tanks. established in 2002, the company provides a range of services including the construction of various storage devices such as clinker silos, cement silos, fly ash silos, gls steel bolted tanks, grain silos, over-head water tanks, and bridge piers using slip form technology. they also fabricate pressure vessels and custom-engineered products for api storage tanks. astha infra engg (i) pvt ltd is iso-certified and is known for its expertise in tank jacking equipment and automatic girth welding machines. the company serves multiple industries, including the oil and gas sector, and is committed to delivering reliable and efficient solutions.
